text: Ana'ma hanige'za nagri ha' vahe'mo'zama nege'za Ra Anumzamo'a agri kaziga mani'ne hu'za nehu'za, Ra Anumzana kagri Anumzamo'a iga mani'ne hu'zama hu'naza nanekegura zamagazegu hugahaze. Nagri ha' vahe'mo'zama havizama hanaza zana, nagra navufinti zamagegahue. Ana hugahazankino kampi hapa me'nege'za vahe'mo'za rehapa kopa hu'za vano hazaza hu'za haviza hugahaze.
